title: A moste excellent comedie of Alexander, Campaspe, and Diogenes played beefore the Queenes Maiestie on twelfe day at night, by her Maiesties children, and the children of Poules.
author: Lyly, John, 1554?-1606.
notes: The first leaf is blank except for a fleuron.
Running title reads: A tragicall comedie of Alexander and Campaspe.
Identified as STC 17048b on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
